Description: Green glazed steatite scarab, elytra marked and humeral callosities present, base decorated with a king in blue crown adoring uraeus, and inscribed with hieroglyphs above.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (2203)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
Purchased from: Giza Museum (and other sources)
